title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval and agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, multi-model, admin panel, RAG, user auth).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy search, chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and model preload.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama via REST API, ready for Next.js.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing Ollama binary, CUDA variants and NixOS module.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for LLM-based testing or codegen.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama with Tokio and SSE support; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings and tool-calling; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with cross-compilation support and zero-dependency HTTP.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts via Ollama and insert results into notes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in pipelines for QA & summarization.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using any Ollama model; supports threads and app mentions.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord with role-based model access and moderation.
